itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: William Stuart Prosser (1887 – 12 March 1939) was a Welsh rugby union and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1910s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Pontypool RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Great Britain, and at club level for Halifax (Heritage № 209), as a stand-off, i.e. number 6.

response: * Stuart Prosser (1887–1939), Welsh rugby union and professional rugby league footballer
